column1: '''Janet Brennan Croft''' (b.[[1961]]) is an American author
column3: and Head of Access and Delivery Services
column4: University Libraries at Rutgers University. She is the editor of ''[[Mythlore|Mythlore: A Journal of J.R.R. Tolkien
column7: and Mythopoeic Literature]]''.<ref>"Notes on Contributors" in [[Tolkien Studies: Volume 4|''Tolkien Studies'': Volume 4]] (p. 366)</ref>
